p: Our survey indicates that C. macropomum is common in the invaded regions, especially in the Paraná-Paraguay River basin. Fish farms stocking the species are common in the Paraná-Paraguay, East Atlantic, Northeast Atlantic basins and in the Amazon ( Fig 1). Among the 14 South American river basins, the Pacific, Lake Titicaca and Colorado-Patagonian basins do not show occurrences of C. macropomum in natural environments.
